QuestData.Title: Vordrassil's Seeds
QuestData.Description: We must make sure that Vordrassil is never regrown. The furbolg must have harvested its seed.$B$BGo to Grizzlemaw, in central Grizzly Hills, and obtain all the seeds that you can find. I will make sure they're properly destroyed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to go to Grizzlemaw and obtain 8 of Vordrassil's Seeds.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained Vordrassil's seeds yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I'll take those from you.$B$BThe corruptive power of these seeds is dangerous. I must destroy them right away.
